text: Ernest-François Mallard. Ernest-François Mallard (4 February 1833 – 6 July 1894) was a French mineralogist and a member of the French Academy of Sciences.Ernest-François Mallard – Catholic Encyclopedia article He is also notable for his work with Henri Louis Le Chatelier in combustion as applied to mining safety."Mallard, (François) Ernest." – Complete Dictionary of Scientific Biography ==References== Category:French scientists Category:Mineralogists Category:French mining engineers Category:Members of the French Academy of Sciences Category:1833 births Category:1894 deaths
title: Ernest-François Mallard
